channel.title: R Regression on Guanghua

item.title: Least Square Dummy Variable Regression V.S. Fixed Effect Model
item.description: In the panle regression setup, the coefficients in the Least Square Dummy Variable model is identical to that in the Fixed Effect Model. However, the computing time needed is much less in the Fixed Effect Model than the time in the Least Square Dummy Variable Model. if (!require(plm)) install.packages("plm") ## Loading required package: plm ## Warning in library(package, lib.loc = lib.loc, character.only = TRUE, ## logical.return = TRUE, : there is no package called 'plm' ## Installing package into '/home/guanghua/Documents/blog/blog-hugo/packrat/lib/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/3.
